definitions.definition: An electronic device which uses a piezoelectric transducer to make chirping noise, often designed to be hidden and function as an annoyance
Specifically, a version of the above designed to be thrown for placement. Similar to a throwie .

main_definition: An electronic device which uses a piezoelectric transducer to make chirping noise, often designed to be hidden and function as an annoyance
secondary_definitions: Specifically, a version of the above designed to be thrown for placement. Similar to a throwie .
